title: markinaz
author: markinaz
created_time: March 14, 2023, 01:37:51 AMLast edit: March 14, 2023, 10:21:15 PM by Markzellers
content: I wanted to start a new thread.  This is a pre-sale with no payment required at this point; however, please be serious if you are ordering.This is only for large quantities, 200 or more chips.  Price is 52 cents per chip payable in BTC after I receive the chips (plus shipping from my ZIP 85044 to yours).Please DM me an order such as this:Denomination   Quantity$1   $5   $10   $25   $100   $500   $1,000   $2,500   $5,000   $10,000   $25,000   $50,000   The individual set of 12 will be available, after I get enough interest to lock in the price.  NO NEED TO RESPOND if you only want the set of 12.Sorry for the multiple posts, but I am trying to do this without profit, hence why the back and forth.Final proof is here:If I cannot get the 2,000 chip order threshold, I will see still move forward.  I am going to likely make 2 sets of chips for myself (1 for sure, 1 if needed to hit the 2k threshold).   No deposit needed, I will only ask for BTC after I have the chips in my possession.Thanks!Mark

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Quick update, I think we hit the quota for the large quantity order. Reminder, this is a one time deal, I will not create a 2nd batch.  If anyone else is interested, please let me know in the next 24 hours.  Again, this is for the large quantity orders.   For commemorative, there will be a very very limited number of 12 chips and I think those are now all spoken for from the previous thread and or direct message. Thanks!Mark

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Confirmed one last order for - av8rjeff.Ordering is now complete!Thanks everyone.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: One set for - geophphreigh as well.   Ordering is now closed.  There are only going to be a few playable sets, I am pretty excited about these!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Would like one complete set as stated in other thread but sales are closed already?

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: MM,Yes, I see you did respond to the other thread (so did Hookzup1, who is ordering a full set), so yes, I will gladly accept your order.   That's it though, no additional orders.Thanks!Mark

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: I had them make the final sample run, here is a glimpse:

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Can I get in on this?

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: MZ, Congrats on getting this done successfully. Can you share the final mintage?

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Here are the totals I ordered:Denomination   Quantity$1            779$5            634$10            450$25            394$100    393$500    251$1,000    197$2,500    164$5,000    162$10,000    157$25,000    147$50,000    142Most people are ordering full sets of playable chips, so the sets of 12 will likely be rare.  I think there will be about 62 commemorative sets total available (unless people split up their chip set, which I doubt).I am looking forward to these arriving, should be within 2 weeks.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Chips are arriving today!  Woohoo!  I will be updating with some photos and reaching out to those who ordered to arrange pickup/shipping.Thanks!Mark

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Received some of the chips today on behalf of another collecter... they are nice and the quality is good Will have to get a set

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Got my chips today! they look great.one issue, the $500 and the $1000 have the same date: Nov 17, 2013the $500 says Sunday as well - which the 17th was a Sunday the $1000 says Wednesday though which was not Nov 17, 2013.From my sheets I see Bitcoin crossing 1000 early on Thursday Nov 23, 2013 - depending on timezones that could have been Wednesday Nov 22, 2013My box holding 200 assorted chips and waiting on the two decks from slumberjack to finish it off.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on April 19, 2023, 02:26:23 AMGot my chips today! they look great.one issue, the $500 and the $1000 have the same date: Nov 17, 2013the $500 says Sunday as well - which the 17th was a Sunday the $1000 says Wednesday though which was not Nov 17, 2013.From my sheets I see Bitcoin crossing 1000 early on Thursday Nov 23, 2013 - depending on timezones that could have been Wednesday Nov 22, 2013MM, great catch on the $1,000 chip.   I reached out to the company to see if there is anything they will do, as the original request was:   $500             November 17th, 2013      Purple        $1,000          November 27th, 2013      Yellow    So, I emailed the company and I will see what they offer.  Worst comes to worst I will cover shipping, I am hoping they either give a free replacement, or a discounted one.   Finally, if they don't offer anything, I was planning on ordering the $100K chips later this year, so maybe we can order a corrected batch at that time. BTW, the set looks great!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: yes sorry the 23rd was specific to trading on mt gox now that I look back, everywhere else it was 795 on the 23rd. wed the 27th was where it crossed 1k at the exchanges.just need slumberjacks cards to finish it off.
